articles.description: Krishnan also believes that considering that inflation is under control and that the current government and its policies are expected to continue post next year’s general elections, the markets are not over-priced.
articles.content:

articles.description: India News: BENGALURU: HCLTech is skipping salary hikes for mid to senior employees this fiscal and has deferred salary increases to junior employees by a quarter.

articles.description: Major crypto exchanges, such as Coinbase and Kraken, have relisted XRP after a judge ruled the digital asset sold on an exchange is not a security.
